title: Ep 311: Godfrey & The Cheddar Man
itunes:title: Ep 311: Godfrey & The Cheddar Man
description:
Bobby hashes it out in the Comedy Store parking lot as Marc Maron watches. Godfrey gets a standing O for SNL. Khalyla loves an upside-down Attenborough. Gilbert knows Butterfly in the Sky. We talk Cheddar Men, Mexican vampires, nice ways to say No, and acting with Snoop Dogg.
